s0: ^Ahh! Don't sneak up on people like that!
^I guess it makes sense she'd be here. I wasn't really paying attention to my surroundings.

b: ^[Charlotte] "Oh, my! I'm terribly sorry... It was not my intention to frighten you!"

Start: ^[Charlotte] "I apologize for disturbing you, but I couldn't help but notice your morose expression from my seat at the window."
^"I thought perhaps you might be in need of some... `cheering up`."
^Can't hide anything from Charlotte. Not that I was trying.
^Do I really want company right now?

c: ^The two of us take a seat by the window and chat for a little while.
^How the weather has been so nice recently.
^How silly it is that the biggest book in the library is about microbiology.
^How the wrinkles in the cushions look like little rivers.
^] "Thanks. But I think I just need some time to myself to work some things out."
^[Charlotte] "Ah. Yes. Of course. You need time alone."
^"It's at times such as these that I envy the empathy of others the least."
^. If you have need of me, I'll be here."
^Charlotte returns to her seat by the window.
^I occasionally withdraw a book and thumb through a few pages before inevitably returning it to the shelf to begin again.

g-0: ^After a while, I excuse myself politely.
